definition: to make sense of/to grasp the meaning of/to figure out
lane/alley
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with
variant of 弄[long4]
old variant of 弄[nong4]
to understand/to comprehend
to get a thorough understanding of sth (idiom)

sentences.english: His mind reached after an understanding of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 他开动脑筋，想弄懂这个问题。

sentences.english: Know the difference between needing advice and needing affirmation.
sentences.chinese: 弄懂需要建议和需要肯定的区别。

sentences.english: We need to be able to better understand the consequences of these connections.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要更好地把这些联系带来的影响弄懂。

sentences.english: Learn the rules so you know how to break them properly.
sentences.chinese: 先弄懂规则，才会知道该如何适切地打破成规。

sentences.english: So we do what we can to understand them, to be ready for change.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们竭尽全力去弄懂它们，为改变做好准备。

sentences.english: It's easy to understand the appeal of certain regulation.
sentences.chinese: 我们很容易弄懂监管方面存在的一些问题。

sentences.english: The theory of learning, and how many people really thoroughly understand, and understand it?
sentences.chinese: 而理论上的学习，又有多少人真正的吃透了，弄懂了？

sentences.english: You see what we've got here?
sentences.chinese: 你们都弄懂这个结论了吧？

sentences.english: Clarify the question. Before attempting to answer a question, be sure you understand what the questioner wants.
sentences.chinese: 在回答一个问题之前，确保弄懂这些问题真正的目的。
从来没有完全弄懂这个法则。

sentences.english: Additionally you need to understand the terms of your mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 另外，你需要弄懂贷款的期限问题。

sentences.english: Learn the difference between fluency and speed.
sentences.chinese: 弄懂流利与速度的差异。

sentences.english: No matter how hard he tried, he just could not understand higher mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 不论他如何努力，他就是无法弄懂高等数学。

sentences.english: So you see the basic idea.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们现在弄懂了这个基本概念。

sentences.english: Every day I make an effort to go toward what I don't understand.
sentences.chinese: 每天，我都努力走向我没有弄懂的东西。

sentences.english: And I was obliged to make a great mental effort to solve this problem, without any assistance.
sentences.chinese: 可是我自己要费很大的心劲才能弄懂这个问题。

definition: to figure out how to do something
to understand what one is reading or watching
to clarify/to fully understand
to get a good grasp of
to understand/to comprehend/to grasp
to follow good examples
to fully grasp/to penetrate
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
to understand (on hearing)/to catch (what is spoken)
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
lit. to know one and understand half (idiom); a smattering of knowledge/dilettante/amateur
to understand/to comprehend
lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
to read and understand
to comprehend/to understand/comprehension/understanding
